name: Beneath Red Waters
description:
Wander around an isolated facility posing various questions 
to familiar strangers.

Press the Left Cursor button to advance and select. 

Press S to speed up the text.

Press M to mute the current music.

Contains potentially disturbing, graphic and or upsetting content.

If you enjoyed this game be sure to rate it, recommend it to your friends or leave a comment on what your feedback is.
